articles.title: Unacademy reportedly lays off 1000 employees from sales, business and other functions
articles.description: Edtech firm Unacademy has reportedly laid off 1,000 employees over the last few weeks in order to control its cash burn.
articles.content: Edtech firm Unacademy has laid off as many as 600 employees over the last few weeks as it looks to turn profitable by the end of this year, the company confirmed on April 7. The company noted that th… [+2080 chars]
